title: Connecting With The Right People | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Connecting With The Right People | Joel Osteen
description:
Life is too short to let negative people keep you from everything God created you to be. Get around people who believe in your dreams and watch God take you to places you never dreamed.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
